Title: Apple Division
Description: There are n apples with known weights. Your task is to divide the apples into two groups so that the difference between the weights of the groups is minimal.
Input Specification:
The first input line has an integer n: the number of apples. 
 The next line has n integers p_1,p_2,\dots,p_n: the weight of each apple.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the minimum difference between the weights of the groups.
